PROJECT_MANAGERS.description: A list of project manager email addresses to send project requests to.

CELERY_ALWAYS_EAGER.description: If celery tasks should be executed in eager manner.

DJANGO_DEBUG.description: Enabled the debug mode in webapp.

DJANGO_DEV.description: Is responsible for loading the additional utilities for the day to day development.

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key that is used by django.

SSH_KEY.description: A ssh key which will be used to fetch repositories

SSH_CONFIG.description: Contents of the ``~/.ssh/config`` file used when Pontoon connects to VCS servers via SSH. Used for disabling strict key checking and setting the default user for SSH.

NEW_RELIC_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the New Relic REST API. Used to mark deployson New Relic.

NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME.description: Name to give to this app on New Relic. Required if you're using New Relic.

STATIC_HOST.description: Hostname to prepend to static resources paths. useful for serving static files from a cdn.

SVN_LD_LIBRARY_PATH.description: Path to prepend to ``LD_LIBRARY_PATH`` when running SVN. This is necessary on Heroku because the Python buildpack alters the path in a way that breaks the built-in SVN command.

TZ.description: Timezone for the dynos that will run the app. Pontoon operates in UTC

HEROKU_DEMO.description: Loads some enhancements for better integration with heroku.
